companies.name: Mediar
companies.tagline: AI hands for every Windows desktop
companies.description: ðŸ¤– Giving AI hands to automate the global economy. Transform manual workflows into automated processes with AI agents that achieve 95% success rate and <20s latency.
companies.longDescription: The global economy runs on legacy Windows software with no APIs. AI is exponentially smarter but can't operate in this environment because it has no hands. Mediar gives AI its hands. They've built AI agents that watch users work, compile automations autonomously, and scale across hundreds of desktops.
companies.whyWeLoveThem: Mediar is solving a massive problem: bridging the gap between AI intelligence and legacy software that powers 90% of enterprise operations. While others dream about AI agents, Mediar ships production-ready automation that cuts costs by 90% on repetitive work.
companies.funFact: Their AI learns from watching humans work for just 1 day before achieving 95% automation success rate - faster than training a new employee! ðŸš€

funding.announcement: We raised $2.8M to bring AI hands to every Windows desktop.

founders.name: Louis Beaumont
founders.bio: Building AI that never forgets. Previously built Screenpipe.

companies.name: Shield
companies.description: Shield makes accepting stablecoins legal and simple
companies.longDescription: Shield makes accepting stablecoins legal and simple.
companies.whyWeLoveThem: Shield makes accepting stablecoins legal and simple for underserved exporters. By verticalizing compliance for high-value trade flows and pairing crypto rails with bank-grade settlement, they remove the bottlenecks that routinely freeze legitimate businesses out of the financial system.
companies.funFact: Demand for Shield's USDT-friendly accounts is so strong that new businesses are onboarded on a waitlist to keep throughput stable.

leadInvestors: Strategic angels from Bank of America
funding.announcement: We raised $5M to build a neobank for global trade businesses.

founders.name: Emmanuel Udotong
founders.bio: Former McKinsey risk advisor and exporter building stablecoin rails for trade corridors.

founders.name: Isaiah Udotong
founders.bio: MIT-trained operator scaling compliance-first payments after firsthand export challenges.

founders.name: Luis Carchi
founders.bio: Princeton engineer and ex-Facebook product leader architecting Shield's stablecoin infrastructure.

metrics.clientSegments: Exporters across Latin America, Africa, and Asia
metrics.settlement: Same-day USD wires from stablecoin payments

companies.name: Lava
companies.description: The world's first bitcoin-backed line of credit. Access dollars in real time without selling your bitcoin â€” now at just 5%.
companies.longDescription: The same way Zero Finance gives companies access to 8% yield on insured USDC, Lava finally makes it possible to lend your BTC and earn 5%! Lava offers the world's first bitcoin-backed line of credit, enabling users to unlock their bitcoin's purchasing power instantly, flexibly, and securely without selling. With a 5% interest rate (plus 2% capital charge on largest outstanding yearly balance), Lava provides global access to dollar liquidity backed by Bitcoin. Using self-custodial Discreet Log Contracts (DLCs), borrowers maintain full control of their Bitcoin while accessing dollar liquidity from $100 to $1B+ with sub-second processing.
companies.whyWeLoveThem: Lava bridges the gap between Bitcoin holders and dollar liquidity without forcing anyone to sell their BTC. While Zero Finance enables startups to earn yield on idle capital, Lava enables Bitcoin holders to access credit at industry-leading rates. Together, they represent the future of crypto-native financial infrastructure â€” earning on stablecoins, borrowing against Bitcoin. What sets Lava apart is true self-custody through DLCs and institutional-grade security with zero rehypothecation risk.
companies.funFact: Lava processes loans in under 5 seconds with an average of just 400 milliseconds â€” faster than you can blink! And it's available globally from day one with zero geographical restrictions ðŸŒâ‚¿âš¡

funding.announcement: We raised $200M to scale the world's first bitcoin-backed line of credit globally.

founders.name: Shehzan Maredia
founders.bio: Building the financial infrastructure for the Bitcoin standard. Enabling people to save in BTC, spend in dollars, and live free.
